modName: Hide Circlet - A NO HELMET MOD
summary:
I went through the whole game without a helmet on my head, but i always hated  missing 1 slot in Enchanting.
This little Mesh edit gives you the Option too hide them, and get the full benefits from your Enchanting Skills. 
(Of course you lose Armor with Circlets )
descriptionHtml:
( Hide Circlet - A NO HELMET MOD )
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I went through the whole game without a helmet on my head, but i always hated  missing 1 slot in Enchanting.
This little Mesh edit gives you the Option too hide them, and get the full benefits from your Enchanting Skills. 
(Of course you lose Armor with Circlets )


It works on all Races

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recommended mod for working Perks:   [url= http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2460]No Helmets Required by ClassicalNoodle[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If requested i will create Optional files with only 1 sort of the Circlet

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install: 

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files
Move the meshes folder to your Skyrim folder

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Or use the NMM 


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Uninstall: 

Remove the the folder \"circlets\" in your  ~  Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\    



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Martique
